aboutDescription.aboutDesc: FE developer with BE skills. I work in the entire software lifecycle, from requirements discussions with customers to UI and UX analysis and processing up to the release and maintenance. I have strong knowledge of html, css and javascript/Typescript, java and I work with single page applications frameworks. My basic tech stack includes React.js/Next.js + Typescript, Node, Redux Toolkit or AngularJS but in the past i used also some html template engines like Pug / Jade. I have experiences with CMS integrations such as Magnolia CMS, Open CMS, Wordpress and Adobe Experience Manager, working with Docker and CI/CD deployment (Gitlab), data visualization tools (D3.js or others), and using maps (Google Maps API).
aboutDescription.aboutDesc2: This react project is meant to be a set of components that I have made over time.
aboutDescription.checkout: Check out my Work in progress

bloodsucker.desc: Bloodsucker was born in 2015 in a small apartment in Udine, designed and created by Alberto Callegari.
